WRITING.TEXT: A few novellas that are on my to-read list (may be up to c. 200 pages); The House on Mango Street The Ballad of Peckham Rye Cannery Row The Faery Handbag Memories of my Melancholy Whores A Chronicle of a Death Foretold The Lover The End of the Affair Ending Up Bonjour Tristesse
Also, a little over 100 pages: Breakfast at Tiffany's by Capote David Golder by Nemirovsky
